Welcome to QakeAPI's documentation!
================================

QakeAPI is a lightweight ASGI web framework designed for building fast and modern web applications.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   quickstart
   api-reference
   security
   middleware
   advanced/index

Features
--------

* Fast and lightweight ASGI framework
* Built-in authentication and security features
* Extensive middleware support
* Modern Python type hints
* Easy-to-use API
* Comprehensive documentation

Getting Started
--------------

Check out the :doc:`installation` guide to install QakeAPI, then read the :doc:`quickstart` 
to learn how to create your first application.
